price: 4 Telles sont les faveurs infinies du Seigneur qu’Il accorde à qui Il veut.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ فَضۡلُ ٱللَّهِ يُؤۡتِيهِ مَن يَشَآءُۚ وَٱللَّهُ ذُو ٱلۡفَضۡلِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: dhālika faḍlu al-lahi yu'tīhi man yashāu wal-lahu dhū al-faḍli al-ʿaẓīmi
